overview: Inspired by an ancient incubation treatment known as Enkoimeses, this sci-fi queer film portrays Hygieia, Goddess of Health and Hygiene, and daughter of Asclepius, God of Healing, experiencing a powerful awakening. Through a hypnotic and dream-like aesthetic, these spiritual and symbolic entanglements propel an untouchable body into the infinite universe.
tagline: If you sacrifice your desire, you become the sacrifice.
title: Hygieia
